attributes.action: Give NHS staff a pay rise that recognises their incredible commitment.
attributes.additional_details: Nurses, and other NHS staff, have put themselves at risk every day just by turning up to work; they have saved countless lives; they have comforted the dying when their families could not; some have lost their lives to Covid.  They have gone above and beyond and a 1% pay rise is insulting given their outstanding, and selfless, contribution.
attributes.background: Revise the proposed 1% pay rise for NHS staff. Initiatives such as the furlough scheme are fantastic, but such generosity versus a 1% pay rise for our amazing nurses is incomprehensible.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253
